Members’ Privileges
Join Blue Cross SmartClub to enjoy premium discount and earn 1 SmartPoint for every HK$1 net premium spent upon successful enrolment via SmartClub website. With the accumulated SmartPoints, you can redeem fabulous gifts and e-Cash voucher from the following merchants.
New members can enjoy a welcome bonus of 300 SmartPoints upon the first insurance enrolment. Refer friends and family to join SmartClub, you can earn an extra referral bonus of 100 SmartPoints upon their insurance enrolment. Make referrals, more bonus!
